Label: Metadata Attribute
Definition: An attribute describing some information about data.

Label: Value Set
Definition: A finite set of values for a metadata attribute.

Label: Value
Definition: An element of a value set.

Label: isProvisional
Definition: An annotation property to indicate that an entity is provisional and subject to change in the future.

Label: allowsMultipleValues
Definition: An annotation property to indicate that an attribute allows for multiple values.
